resources.string: Please focus camera on QR Code
"Sdk has not been initialized. The initialization is required in onCreate of the main activity."
"SDK has not been initialized, cannot delete user data."
"Modality engine has not started, cannot delete user data."
"Authenticator is activated. Please sync modality availabilities right after to ensure all modalities available would show properly for enrollment setup."
"Authenticator is already activated. Please sync modality availabilities right after to ensure all modalities available would show properly for enrollment setup."

"Correct Care is an app that was created by Faraz Ali. It's main purpose is to improve security around the patient record retrieval process in healthcare systems. Secondarily, it also encompasses features that can aid in the reduction of wrong site surgeries."

"The app requires you to verify yourself using one of your enrolled biometrics in order to retrieve a patient's records. So, make sure you have visited the \"Biometrics\" tab and have activated this phone and enrolled at least 2 of your biometrics. Then, simply go back to the main page, select a patient, and tap \"Get Records\" to authenticate yourself."

"To identify a patient the phone needs to be activated and the patient must have a biometric in your database/system. Simply tap on the small cameraID icon in the bottom right corner of the main page and authenticate the patient with a biometric."

"A default biometric can be chosen out of your enrolled biometric modalities. It is a way to tell the authentication system which biometric it should automatically target you at when authenticating if the system's authentication level is set to creating requests at 1 modality."

"Scanner activation will bring up the phone's camera and will allow you to scan a BioConnect released QR Code which will bind your phone to the authentication system. Online activation does the same protocol through API calls... so you don't need a QR Code for it."
"Absolutely! Just visit the \"Biometrics\" tab and then tap on \"Manage Modalities\". There you can manage your current biometrics and even set or change a default one."
